election_record.label: Virginia 1805 House of Delegates, Frederick County, Special

overview.note: "Hugh Holmes, having been elected a judge of the General Court, resigned as Speaker of the House. The vacancy in the Frederick delegation was filled by Charles Brent and the Speakership by Peter Johnston." Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.

election_record.reference: Frederick County Poll List. Library of Virginia, Richmond.
Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
